title: Chicken and mushroom rice
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 small onion, chopped (optional)', '500g skinless, boneless chicken, diced', '200g diced bacon (optional)', '500g mushrooms, sliced', '300ml double cream', '125ml dry white cooking wine', '1-2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', 'small amount of tarragon (use sparingly)', 'salt and pepper to taste', '360g rice, cooked and drained']
